## Overview

This module creates the table of coefficient values for the variables that are constant in my fire model e.g. intercept + b1 * slope + b2 * elevation + b3 * distance_to_infrastructure etc. I could run this in its own script but I figured putting it into a SpaDES module would make it more adaptable if I want to change the equations or anything like that. 

```{r module_usage}
library (SpaDES.core)
library (data.table)
source (paste0(here::here(), "/R/functions/R_Postgres.R"))

moduleDir <- file.path(paste0(here::here(), "/R/SpaDES-modules"))
inputDir <- file.path(paste0(here::here(), "/R/SpaDES-modules/fireCastor/inputs")) %>% reproducible::checkPath(create = TRUE)
outputDir <- file.path(paste0(here::here(), "/R/SpaDES-modules/fireCastor/outputs"))
cacheDir <- file.path(paste0(here::here(), "/R/SpaDES-modules/forestryCastor"))

times <- list(start = 0, end = 0)
parameters <- list(
  .progress = list(type = NA, interval = NA),
  .globals = list(),
  fireCastor = list(dbName='castor',
                         saveCastorDB = TRUE,
                         sqlite_dbname = "fire_April2023_test", 
                         #useCastorDB = paste0(here::here(), "/R/scenarios/central_group/inputs/central_group_march2023_castordb.sqlite"),
                         nameBoundaryFile ="public.forest_tenure", 
                         nameBoundaryColumn = "tsa_number", 
                         nameBoundary = "tsa_number = 23", 
                         nameBoundaryGeom = 'geom',
                         nameCompartmentRaster = "rast.forest_tenure",
                         nameCompartmentTable = "vat.forest_tenure_vat",
                         nameFrtRaster ='rast.frt', 
                         namesDemRast = "rast.dem", 
                         namesSlopeRast = "rast.bc_ha_slope",
                         namesAspectRast = "rast.bc_ha_aspect",
                         namesInfrastructureRast = "rast.dist_infrastructure",
                         namesSummerWindRast = "rast.summer_wind",
                         namesSpringWindRast = "rast.spring_wind")

  # uploadCastor = list(aoiName = 'bc_test', 
  #                     dbInfo  = list(keyring::key_get("vmdbhost", keyring="postgreSQL"), 
  #                                    keyring::key_get("vmdbuser", keyring="postgreSQL"), 
  #                                    keyring::key_get("vmdbpass", keyring="postgreSQL"),  
  #                                    keyring::key_get("vmdbname", keyring="postgreSQL"))
  #                 )
)

modules <- list("fireCastor")

scenario = data.table (name = "fire_April2023_test",
                       description = "This is a test of coalating data to calculate the coefficients that dont change.")

objects <- list(scenario = scenario)

paths <- list(cachePath = cacheDir,
              modulePath = moduleDir,
              inputPath = inputDir,
              outputPath = outputDir)

mySim <- simInit(times = times, params = parameters, modules = modules,
                 objects = objects, paths= paths)

system.time({
mysimout<-spades(mySim)
})

#Run the model with experiment
#sims3 <- experiment(mySim, replicates = 2)

#Profile the model
#profvis::profvis({system.time({mysimout<-spades(mySim)})})


```
